clients.title: Be Consistent in Getting Online Reviews
description: Online reviews play an important role in the decision-making process of choosing an attorney. Your potential clients are likely looking at reviews of your services on various platforms. Be sure they are viewing quality, current reviews of your services by asking current and former clients to submit reviews on Google My Business, the Justia Lawyer Directory, and Google Local Services Ads.
If you are a Justia Amplify client, you can utilize your customized page for requesting reviews to give your clients easy access to all of the sites where you need their feedback.
